name: Uyuni (Lio Lim)
description:
Uyuni is an endless runner played on the world's largest natural mirror, the Uyuni Salt Flats. Isn't it beautiful?

⚠️ This game is still in development. This demo currently features only one level. Look forward to more obstacles and twists ahead! ⚠️

Controls: Up to jump & double jump, Down to roll (no purpose yet!)

Made in 2 weeks for GDKO 2023 - Round 1
Theme: Create a single level in a unique location.

Art by 
https://ansimuz.itch.io/mountain-dusk-parallax-background
https://dani-maccari.itch.io/player-animations-tim
https://dani-maccari.itch.io/platformer-metroidvania-pixel-items-free-assets
Fonts by
https://lana-ro.itch.io/sra-free-pixel-font-pack
